summary: A man who stops into a foster home to drop off some donations soon tells the kids a story about two teenage friends who uncover a long-lost medallion that transports them back in time.
cast: William Brent|Sammi Hanratty|James Hong|Jansen Panettiere|William Corkery|Alex Kendrick|Mark Dacascos|Lisa LoCicero|Hal Rudnick|Sidney S. Liufau|Tiya Sircar|Jennifer Rhodes|Ken Streutker|Tom J.|Tanapol Chuksrida|Schnitrnunt Busarakamwong|Sahajak Boonthanakit|Andrew Franklin|Brie Bernstein|Harmon Jones|Marlowe Peyton|Tenzing Norgay Trainor|Merit Leighton|Casey Jones|Alex J. Dean|Connor Dean|Mark Charnick|John Marengo|Eric Unger
